title: Matale Old Thomians' Cricket Fiesta 2025
text:
Old Thominas 1987 group and 2003 ‘A’ team emerged senior and intermediate category champions at the inaugural Matale Old Thomians cricket Fiesta held recently at Bernard Aluvihare Stadium Matale.
The senior age group finals 1987 Group 1991 Group team to win Jack Robertson Trophy while 2003 ‘A’ team beat 2003 ‘B’ tot take Chanaka Welagedera Trophy.
In addition 2014 team won the youth category to take Lahiru Madushanka Trophy defeating 2011 team at the final Matale Old Thomins’ Association has organised this inaugural Cricket Fiesta while 38 batch teams were participated this cricket fiesta from three categories senior, Intermediate and youth.
The purpose of this Event was to regain the unity, goodwill and foster among young and old Thomians and to share their college past experience and keep Thomians’ Spirit and the Traditional values of the College said the Tournament Director and the 1989 College 1st XI Cricket Captain and the Premier Match Referee Sri Lanka Cricket Ravi Punchihewa. Sri Lanka all rounder former Matale Thomain cricketer Lahiru Madushanka the champion Sri Lanka team at recently concluded Hong Kong Cricket Sixes was the chief Guest at this cricket fiesta while St Thomas College Matale Principal Dhammika Hewawasam and the President of Matale Old Thomian Association Attoney-at – law . Manohara Koswatte were graced this cricket fiesta as special invitees.
Scores : Finals
Senior Category :- Champions- 1987 Team Runner Up :- 1991 Team
Finals 1991 Team 16 for 5 in 5 overs Kalum Hettiarchchi 2/2 Dammika Hewawasam 1/2
1987 Team 18 for no loss in 2 overs Kalum Hettiarchchi 10 , Krishantha Silva 8
Intermediate Category Champions- 2003 (A) Team Runner Up :- 2003 (B) Team
2003 (B) 29 for 3 in 5 overs K. Sanjaya 10 Bandula Silva 2/10 203 (A) 30 for 2 in overs Bandula Silva 24 , Vidantha 3/10
Youth Category Champions- 2014 Team Runner Up :- 2011 Team
2014 Team 42 for 4 in 5 overs K. Jayalath 30 2011 Team 22 all out in 3.4 overs M. Sanith 3/5 K. Amunugama 2/6
